title: Simply astonishing!
review: Steven Spielberg is a very expert of Films... And this movie demostrate that!

title: Soap
review: I Really think that this movie deserves more oscar's nominations. It is one of my favorite movies and my David Fincher's favorite movie (Gone Girl in second place) Brad Pitt is incredible and Edward Norton bring us one of his best performances ever! ðŸ‘Š

title: Scorsese at his best!
review:
Simply the best movie of 2019. Martin Scorsese is my favourite moviemaker and this is one of my favourite movies of him! De Niro, Pacino and the incredible Pesci are the best threesome in a movie.
PD: My favourite scene was the Albert Anastasia hit... Just amazing.

movie_title: Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood
title: Hollywood, 1969
review:
An incredible film, with great performances and a very good screenplay.
The final, when Brandy and Cliff kill the hippies, is one of the best climax in a movie, last years.
PD: The change of the history make that I remember Inglorious Basterds!

title: Astonishing
review: My favorite Scorsese movie. I love the story and the characters... I think that Billy doesn't deserves die in that way. Out of that... Simply amazing!

title: Incredible
review: This movie is the clear example that not all the comedies are bad. The scene wich Donny and Jordan fights for the phone, is one of the scenes that make me cry laughing. Simply incredible!

title: Fantastic!
review: Bong Joon Hoo is at his best! The peach scene is a masterpiece of 21st Century... And the final, god, is epic and godamn sad!
